Lindsey Vonn is an American World Cup alpine ski racer on the US Ski Team. She has won four overall World Cup championships—one of only two female skiers to do so, along with Annemarie Moser-Pröll—with three consecutive titles in 2008, 2009, and 2010, plus another in 2012.
Erik Guay is a Canadian World Cup alpine ski racer from Mont-Tremblant, Quebec.
